author: Source: Redlands Daily Facts
title: Herea s why a Back to the Futurea will last forever - Redlands Daily Facts
text:
The “Back to the Future” movies are among the few that actually deserve it. Innovative in their time , clever beyond belief and still thoroughly entertaining, the time-travel comedies by director Robert Zemeckis and producer/co-writer Bob Gale did everything differently, and remain culturally alive because of it.
 Redlands Daily Facts.
